name: redux-api
description: Flux REST API for redux infrastructure

scripts.test: npm run eslint && npm run mocha
scripts.mocha: istanbul test _mocha --report html -- --require babel/register test/*_spec.js --reporter spec
scripts.build: rm -rf dist lib && npm run browser-dev && npm run browser-min && npm run compile
scripts.coveralls: istanbul cover node_modules/.bin/_mocha --report html --report lcovonly -- --require babel/register  test/*_spec.js && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage
